column5: Enjoyed a near perfect day on the Ottawa river on Sunday.  The weather was stellar with just a few scattered and brief showers.  The fishing was not bad either.  Topwater action was hot for bass.  We boated a few small largemouth and a couple of nice pike.  Here are a few shots ...  Snake (Muskie or Pike?)   Largie
Nice fish!!!  Pike in the first pic!
nice fish, GCD is right, its a pike.
Great report and pics Seaweed  Pike for sure! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice Largie....love when the river's calm like that. WTG
Nice fish looks like you had perfect conditions for fishing  Rob
Top water action is great, WTG...
Nice to see you out on the water Chris!!! Thanks for write up as usual and good wishes..... Pauly
Sounds like a great day out on the water. I'm surprised the Ottawa river actually gets calm like that.
